coded_answer.p: I am one of allthe students and I am going to give you ansome information, all you need. AboutRegarding the end-of-conference party. We, we are going to have a dinner before the end and at the end we are going to bringtake you to the Hotel, you. You need to wear aan night-dressevening dress or suit and bow tie.

Finally, on the last day you have three hours before you catch the plane so we suggestionsuggest, you can go to the shopping centre and buy something for your special person or go to the museammuseum because this museammuseum is the biggest in the world now. It is up to you.

I am the student leader. We are greatfulgratefulpleased that your group has just arrived so I am going to give you information about an interesting building to visit. We recommend you to go to the BBC building.

First of all, aboutthe BBC building is the news building of England. On the ground floor, they have a video cameracameras everywhere around the building and police officerofficers walk around the building as well.
